channel.title: How to change this to this
channel.description: Hello moparscape, i have an issue i have to solve and i need your help. When i made a NEW shop i have added the items into the shop BUT when i value the items, its in GP AS IN gold. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/34pgpzp.png[/img] But I wanted the items to be in TRIZIMOPKZ points not gp. I need help to change the gp to Trizimopkz points. Like this [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/3580wp3.png[/img] If you can help please comment on my thread. I will really appreciate it.

item.title: How to change this to this

item.description:

when i value the items, it was the right way but when try to buy the item it says you don’t have enough coins

item.source: How to change this to this

item.title: How to change this to this
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

PI:

Look in your “ShopAssistant.java” and search for “buyFromShopPrice”, below this, you should see something like:

Under that code, add:

if (c.myShopId == ##) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Trizimopkz."); return; }

Replace ## with the shopId like above.

Make sure you have it so it takes your Trizimopkz points, and not GP. Look for a tutorial on this.

Read full topic
